description:
**Problem**
Durability/idempotency model fixes are not covered by the normal test suite, so regressions (e.g. non-monotonic client-observed receipts) can slip in.

**Design**
- Add a regression test under beads_stateright_models/tests that executes the durability idempotency ActorModel to completion and asserts all properties.
- Expose the example's build_model() so the test can call it without duplicating logic.
- Keep the test deterministic (single thread) and fail fast if model checking does not complete.

**Acceptance**
- [ ] Test added in beads_stateright_models/tests that runs the durability idempotency model and asserts properties.
- [ ] Example exposes a callable build_model() for the test.
- [ ] cargo test in beads_stateright_models passes.

**Files:** beads_stateright_models/examples/durability_idempotency_machine.rs, beads_stateright_models/tests/
title: Stateright regression test for durability idempotency model
